title: tutorial GPU issue
body_html:
Hi guys,
I suppose that you've got an error in tutorial, section "Create the pip package and install" (link):

  1. this command should create pip package:
    $ bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

In order to use GPU in training you need to specify --config=cuda:
$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
body_text:
Hi guys,
I suppose that you've got an error in tutorial, section "Create the pip package and install" (link):

this command should create pip package:
$ bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

In order to use GPU in training you need to specify --config=cuda:
$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
body:
Hi guys,
I suppose that you've got an error in tutorial, section "Create the pip package and install" ([link](http://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup.md#installing_from_sources)):

1) this command should create pip package:
$ bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package 

In order to use GPU in training you need to specify --config=cuda:
$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
